quoteText:
Crowdmark may change these Terms of Service from time to time without notice to you.
Your continued use of the Services after any such change shall constitute your acceptance of such change.
You are responsible for regularly reviewing the most current version of the Terms of Service which are currently available at: crowdmark.com/legal/.
title: Terms of Service may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: From Terms of Service: "Crowdmark may change these Terms of Service from time to time without notice to you. Your continued use of the Services after any such change shall constitute your acceptance of such change. You are responsible for regularly reviewing the most current version of the Terms of Service which are currently available at: crowdmark.com/legal/."
